QuestData.Title: The Stoat Hunt
QuestData.Description: One of the greatest hunting sports amongst the nobles of Boralus is the stoat hunt. It is a sport of determination, patience, and skill. Do you think you can rise to the challenge?$b$bStoats are agile, sneaky, and sharp. They're next to impossible to catch out in the forest, so the best way to find one is to find its burrow and scare it out.$b$bFind their burrows and bring back their pelts. Their fur is soft and much loved amongst the nobles.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Soft Stoat Pelts from Faintstep Stoats.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected enough stoat pelts?
QuestData.RewardText: Not only will these pelts please the nobles, they also prove your worth as a hunter.
